text: Patricia Manterola (; born Bertha Patricia Manterola Carri√≥n on April 23, 1972) is a Mexican singer and actress. She was born in Mexico City.Patty Manterola defiende a los pollos Esmas.com (Spanish)Talk-Show Host Cristina Saralegui Opens Production Studios in Miami Celeste Rodas, Hispanic Business, (May 7, 2001). Her career began in 1989. She was one of the original members of the Mexican pop group Garibaldi. She is known for her role as Julia in the telenovela Apuesta por un amor. From 1999 to 2005, she was married to Garibaldi group member Xavier Ortiz. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Singers from Mexico City Category:Actors from Mexico City
title: Patricia Manterola
